about_the_game:
An exceptionally powerful solar eclipse allowed the creator to conjure up the forest spirit Rarach. This rascally creature was given the ability to wrap in a bubble to move quickly through the flying mountains. Along the way, Rarach learns about this magical world and gains new abilities that accelerate the journey.

An important point on the spirit's journey was marked out by the creator. Rarach must pass through the rift into another world to fulfill an important task.

Extraordinary Adventure

Ethereal Envoy is an adventure game about swift travel through wondrous worlds:

  • Explore the flying mountains and beyond.

  • Use the environment to your advantage and keep up the momentum.

  • Perform evasive maneuvers to avoid obstacles at high speed.

  • Harden your bubble to deflect enemy attacks or break through barriers.

  • Find wells of power that upgrade your abilities.

  • Discover more about the arcane worlds and why you were sent through the rift.

short_description: Embark on an extraordinary high-speed adventure as the forest spirit Rarach. Wrap in a bubble and use various abilities to swiftly roll through the flying mountains and beyond.
